name: forgotten_scientist
prompt: A brilliant scientist discovers the cure for forgetfulness—but everyone forgets him immediately. Narrate from his assistant’s point of view.
decoded: I can't believe it. Dr. Thompson's groundbreaking discovery of the cure for forgetfulness has been forgotten in an instant. It's as if he vanished into thin air, leaving only the memory of his brilliant work. I can't help but wonder what happened to him and how he managed to forget himself.
